message_0.text: The door is locked. What would you like to do?

message_5.text: \wra\aubBut you know how quiet \n[1] is. It’s not like \n[1] would answer you anyway!

message_6.text: \wra\whoHmph... Well, how is \{anyone\} supposed to answer me with you yelling all the time??

message_7.text: \wra\aubW-What do you mean? You’re the one who’s \Com[1000]\{yelling\}, \n[3]!

message_8.text: \wra\whoShh... Settle down, you two! It’s getting too loud. \n[1]’s probably sleeping again.

message_10.text:
\kelBut \n[1] was looking through the keyhole just now!
\}Why do you think I was even knocking in the first place...?\{

message_13.text:
\aub\Com[1000]Hey, \n[1]! If you can hear me...
\Com[1000]\fb\{\n[3] has a mole on his-!

message_15.text: \wra\her\fb\{Hey hey,\}\fr break it up! We're in the middle of a card game, remember? You two can settle this there.

message_26.text: \wraAnd you find someone looking straight back at you!

message_21.text: \wraThe heat from the laptop warmed your lap. It felt pretty nice.

message_22.text: \wraA lightbulb hangs from the ceiling, wherever it is. \! Look into the lightbulb?

message_23.text: \wraIt’s pitch black inside.\|.\|.\| Can’t see a thing.

message_0.text: \aubHi, \n[1]! Hehe~ \!Sorry about the noise earlier...<brl>Wanna play cards with us?\! We were just about to start another game.

message_2.text: \kelMan! What the heck, \n[2]! \!I was winning too...

message_3.text:
\herHey there, \n[3], no need to get angry.
\!It’s just a game, after all.

message_4.text:
\kelDon’t give me that, \n[4]! \!
You only say that ‘cause you were losing.

message_10.text: \kel\{Aw, what the heck!\} \!Where did you get that?

message_12.text: \aubLucky for me, I’ve got some \{real\} friends!

message_13.text: \herServes you right, \n[3]. \!You should know better than picking on others.

message_14.text: \kelBut she started it! \!She was the one who was making fun of me for having a mole on my-

message_19.text:
\aubYay! Thank you, \n[1]! \!I knew I could count on you.\!
You’re the best!

message_20.text: \aubHi, \n[1]! Hehe~ Sorry about the noise earlier.

message_27.text: \aubWhy would he do something like that? \!So immature… \!I mean, what did I ever do to him!?

message_28.text:
\aubAnyway enough about \n[3]...\! Can you find my STUFFED PLANTEGG for me? \!
Pretty please? Hehe~

message_21.text: \kelYo \n[1], \! look at what I found the other day!

message_24.text: \herHey, \n[1]! Sorry about \n[3], you know how he is...

message_26.text:
\herThen again, \.\.\n[2]’s been picking on him so much lately…
\.\. so it goes both ways, I guess.

message_35.text:
\herNow that \{that’s\} settled, let’s meet the others in the FOREST PLAYGROUND.\!
Are you ready to go, OMORI?

message_25.text: You can't leave without your friends.

message_29.text: You feel like you are being watched...

message_30.text: An old TV. It's just playing the same old nonsense.

message_0.text: You have no one to play tag with.
